casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

January 14, 2011

[Cite as 01/14//2011 Case Announcements, 2011-Ohio-97.]

MISCELLANEOUS DISMISSALS

2010-1045. State ex rel. Scanlon v. Pepple.

In Mandamus. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of mandamus.

Upon consideration of relator’s application for dismissal, it is ordered by the court that the application for dismissal is granted. Accordingly, this cause is dismissed.
